TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IDReferencePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Defines an attribute applied to properties that contain ID references. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute> class is applied to properties that contain ID references. <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content.ContentPlaceHolderID%2A> is an example of a property that contains an ID reference. When this attribute is applied, designers can provide additional functionality during design time, such as listing IDs.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute> attribute is applied to a property that evaluates to a string. In this example, the `DataSourceID` member identifies a data source control and therefore specifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> type.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute/CS/IDReferencePropertyAttribute2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute/VB/IDReferencePropertyAttribute2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you call this constructor, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute.ReferencedControlType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>, which is its default value.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute> attribute is applied to a property that evaluates to a string. In this example, the `DataSourceID` member identifies a data source control at run time. By using the default constructor, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute.ReferencedControlType%2A> property is set to the default value, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute/CS/IDReferencePropertyAttribute1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDReferencePropertyAttribute/VB/IDReferencePropertyAttribute1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type referencedControlType) cil managed

Docs.param: A that specifies the type of the control represented by the property to which the is applied.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified type.
